short_description: qr life science division is a regenerative clinic based in bengaluru, india.
long_description: qr life sciences is propagating and imparting a unique, new patented technology for treatment of musculoskeletal disorder & ailments painlessly. this technology magnetic bio stimulation therapy is evolved from european research its principle regenerative therapy without pain, medication, side effects or surgery are all cutting edge & aims to revolutionise treatments of the human body by induction of energy to regenerate. our team of scientists is based in india. we are confident with the right team in place we shall achieve are objective of this revolutionary regenerative technology. our aim is to make our therapy devices, with patented german technology available in all hospitals and clinics in order to provide mbst - as a form of treatment. with the number of successful case studies and reviews from satisfied customers, we are sure this vision will be achieved in the near future.

generated_description: qr life sciences is a division of qr life science division that specializes in propagating and imparting a unique patented technology for the treatment of musculoskeletal disorders and ailments. the technology, called magnetic bio stimulation therapy, has been developed from european research and aims to revolutionize treatments of the human body by induction of energy to regenerate. the treatment works by energizing tissue cells and causing them to regenerate progressively, without pain, medication, side effects, or surgery. qr life sciences plans to make this technology accessible to patients worldwide and conduct research and development in treating ailments outside the musculooskeletal as well as organs in the future. the company's goal is to make their therapy devices, with patented german technology, available in all hospitals and clinics to provide mbst- as a form of treatment for osteoporosis, osteoarthritis, metabolic disorders, sports, and accident injuries.
generated_business_tags: research and development | bio magnetic field stimulation technology | alternative therapy | medical equipment manufacturing | regenerative therapy | patented technology for musculoskeletal disorders
